response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which we believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's valued at $15,000 by us. Considering its high quality and the value it can bring to your operations, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $14,000. This exclusive offer is designed to help you maximize efficiency and profitability in your business endeavors. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this exceptional product to your team. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 14000}
